modShortDescription: Adds the "box" from the backpack buttons modlet that allows the user to lock slots so they won't be moved OR sorted.
modDescription:
Adds the “box” from the [backpack buttons](https://7daystodiemods.com/backpack-buttons/) modlet that allows the user to lock slots so they won’t be moved OR sorted. Also adds one to vehicle inventory that does the same thing.

## Changelog

Updated to move the box + arrows to the left of the sort button so it doesn’t overlap the “clear inventory” button.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-LockableInvSlots)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19558-khaines-a19-modlets-bigger-backpacks-backpack-buttons-hp-bars-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
